APIKeyLink: You can get the API key on the page
No logs info: Log outputs are written at each update.
No logs info2: To minimize the number of write accesses, the output can be reduced here by a check mark.
Reset values: Reset the values before each synchronization
Reset values info: The adapter resets all prices before any scheduled update.
Reset values info2: This function prevents outdated values from being saved if an error occurs when updating from the Tanker King server.
Reset values info3: Check this box to keep the data floating and prevent zeros.
editModal: Opens a window to Edit a station.
intervalInfo: The data of the source feed is updated by the server at tankerkoenig.de only every 4 minutes. The shortest query interval is therefore 5 minutes, as a more frequent query makes no sense.
intervalInfo2: Therefore, the shortest query interval is 5 minutes, since a more frequent query does not make sense.
intervalTooltip: Interval for the Tankerkönig API query. The data from Tankerkönig is updated only every 4 min, so the smallest interval that can be set is 5 min.
tooltipAddStation: Opens a window to add a new station.
tooltipApiKey: A 36-digit API key, which you can get on the tankerkoenig.de site
tooltipStationID: Stations ID can be found on the page of tankerkoenig.de or below on the map
tooltipStationName: Station name you can freely assign (MAX. 20 characters). It is recommended to enter the name of the gas station, e.g. SHELL. This name will be used as name for the data points.
